metadata.title: CVE-2024-1312 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernel's Memory Managementsubsystem when a user wins two races at the same time with a fail in themas_prev_slot function. This issue could allow a local user to crash thesystem.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
